subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Ann's files/stevenjasonthompson012608.mp3 
  Uploaded by : lisbyfarrum <lisby@...> 
  Description : A few weeks ago, I got the name Thompson ("Thompson is old soldier."). Now I hear it again, this time in connection with yet another attempt to verify that Steven is my Technician. The reply is, "Steven...Jason Thompson." 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Ann%27s%20files/stevenjasonthompson012608.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

lisbyfarrum <lisby@...>
